context_text: <A> um my dad fortunately wasn't in new york at the time but he was supposed to go the next day so and uh he was actually going to the you know um to the towers so / <B> right / <A> really very excited that he wasn't there um it was really unfortunate for him though because he lost uh some people that he knew / <B> right / <A> um clients and things like that so he was he was pretty shooken up and it was it was weird to see my uh my dad cry / <B> yeah / <A> you know it i mean it definitely hit everybody a lot and um i went out and you know bought a flag like everybody else but i realized too not only the importance of the flag but after that um a big article in the paper came out saying you know there are veterans all the time that have these flags from like a zillion years ago { and } / <B> [ right ]
